text: Loxwood is an electoral ward of Chichester District, West Sussex, England and returns two members to sit on Chichester District Council. Following a district boundary review, Loxwood was created from the Petworth, Plaistow and Wisborough Green wards in 2019. ==Councillors== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="3"|Year!!Member!!Party!!Member!!Party |- |style="background-color: " | ||rowspan="2"; style="background-color: " | |July 2019 |rowspan="2"|Natalie Hume ||Green |rowspan="2"|Gareth Evans ||rowspan="2"|Liberal Democrat |- | style="background-color: " | |May 2019 |Liberal Democrat |} ==Election results== :* Elected ==References== ==External links== * Chichester District Council * Election Maps Category:Wards of Chichester District
title: Loxwood (ward)
